
Welcome to the app [b]NeaK's BOT[/b] - Music Quiz!
You will find all the commands available to you here ;)

[b]?start[/b] - after entering this command, you will start the application!
[b]?next[/b] - after entering this command, you will skip the current song!
[b]?stop[/b] - after entering this command, you will stop the applicationę!

=======================================================================

[b]Example of a correct title[/b] - "Queen Bicycle Race"
First we give the author, then the title after a space (capital letters do not matter),
If there are 2 authors, list them after the decimal point
[b]Example of a correct title[/b] - "Autor1, Autor2 Tytuł"
